short_description.en: Rebate for 50% of cost up to $250 for attic insulation. Addition of R-38 or greater required.
short_description.es: Reembolso del 50% de los costos hasta $250 dólares por aislamiento térmico del desván. Se requiere un aislamiento R-38 o superior.

equipment_standards_restrictions:
Existing attic
insulation must be
less than R-19
Installation with
air sealing highly
recommended
(not required)
other_restrictions:
Insulation must be installed across the entire attic structure and in all
attic spaces in the home.
• Addition of R-38 or greater and/ or improve to comply with current
state code as structure allows.
• A test-in (home energy assessment) and test-out required for
installation of dense pack or wet spray cellulose or spray foam insulation
(open or closed cell). Homes with combustion appliances must pass
combustion safety testing. Dense pack or wet spray cellulose require
a program contractor; non- air sealing types of insulation may be
contractor or self-installed.
• Reflective materials such as radiant barriers do not qualify for the rebate.
stacking_details: Individual improvements rebates are capped at 50% of installed cost up to $750 per year

short_description.en: Rebate for 50% of cost up to $300 for air sealing. Must be completed by a participating program contractor.
short_description.es: Reembolso del 50% de los costos por sellado hermético, hasta $300 dólares. Debe realizarse por un contratista participante en el programa.

contractor_restrictions: Improvement must be completed by a participating program contractor.
other_restrictions:
Improvement must be completed by a participating program contractor.
• Test-in (home energy assessment) and test-out are required to qualify.
Homes with combustion appliances must pass combustion safety testing.
• Achievement of 20% or more reduction in CFM50 required.
stacking_details: Individual improvements rebates are capped at 50% of installed cost up to $750 per year

short_description.en: Rebate for 50% of cost up to $300 for duct sealing.
short_description.es: Un reembolso del 50% de los costos hasta $300 dólares para el sellado de ductos.

other_restrictions:
Testing of the duct system.
• 30% or more reduction in CFM25 (or equivalent) through duct system
testing. A program contractor or Duct and Envelope Tightness (DET)
verifier may perform this improvement.
stacking_details: Individual improvements rebates are capped at 50% of installed cost up to $750 per year

short_description.en: Rebate for 50% of cost up to $75 for smart thermostats.
short_description.es: Reembolso del 50% de los costos por termostatos inteligentes, hasta $75 dólares.

other_restrictions:
Must be ENERGY STAR® certified.
• Installation of up to two smart thermostats per account, per year.
• Customers may self-install or work with a contractor
stacking_details: Individual improvements rebates are capped at 50% of installed cost up to $750 per year

short_description.en: Rebate for 50% of cost up to $1,000 for ENERGY STAR® certified ground source heat pumps.
short_description.es: Un reembolso del 50% de los costos de bombas de calor geotérmicas con certificación ENERGY STAR, hasta $1,000 dólares.

equipment_standards_restrictions: Must be ENERGY STAR® certified as Geothermal Heat Pump
contractor_restrictions: Improvement must be completed by a licensed HVAC contractor
stacking_details: HVAC and water heating equipment do not count toward the Individual Improvements cap.

short_description.en: Rebate for 50% of cost up to $500 for ENERGY STAR® certified heat pump water heaters.
short_description.es: Reembolso del 50% de los costos  para calentadores de agua con bomba de calor certificados ENERGY STAR, hasta $500 dólares.

stacking_details: HVAC and water heating equipment do not count toward the Individual Improvements cap.

short_description.en: Rebate for 50% of cost up to $50 for ENERGY STAR® certified electric vehicle chargers. Must be 208/240 volt level 2 charger with dedicated circuit.
short_description.es: Reembolso del 50% de los costos para cargadores de vehículos eléctricos con certificación ENERGY STAR, hasta $50 dólares. Debe ser un cargador de nivel 2 de 208/240 voltios con circuito dedicado.

equipment_capacity_restrictions: 208/240 volt level 2 charger with dedicated circuit
other_restrictions: Installation of up to two EV chargers per account.
stacking_details: Individual improvements rebates are capped at 50% of installed cost up to $750 per year

short_description.en: Up to $450 rebate available for all gas to electric heat pump conversions. Rebate amount is based on the size (tonnage) of the heat pump installed.
short_description.es: Reembolso de hasta $450 dólares disponible para todas las conversiones de bombas de calor de gas a electricidad. El monto del reembolso se basa en el tamaño (tonelaje) de la bomba de calor instalada.

short_description.en: Rebate for 50% of cost up to $1,000 for ENERGY STAR® certified mini-split heat pumps.
short_description.es: Un reembolso del 50% de los costos de mini-splits con certificación ENERGY STAR, hasta $1,000 dólares.

equipment_standards_restrictions:
Must be ENERGY STAR® certified as either Ductless Mini-Split Heat
Pump
contractor_restrictions: Improvement must be completed by a licensed HVAC contractor
stacking_details: HVAC and water heating equipment do not count toward the Individual Improvements cap.

short_description.en: Rebate for 50% of cost up to $1,100 for achieving a whole house electric kWh reduction of 20% or more.

contractor_restrictions: Requires a participating program contractor. Contractor must use a program approved energy modeling software.

short_description.en: Rebate for 50% of cost up to $150 for a Home Energy Assessment.
Rebate for 50% of cost up to $35 for an ENERGY STAR certified ceiling fan.
Rebate of 50% of cost up to $150 for installing a timer on an existing pool pump or installing a new pool pump with a timer.
Rebate of 50% of cost up to $40 for installing a high efficiency circulator pump with electronically commutated motor.
Rebate of 50% of cost up to $25 for installing an ENERGY STAR certified dehumidifier.
Rebate of 50% of cost up to $20 for installing a tier 1 or tier 2 advanced power strip.
Rebate of 50% of cost up to $25 for HVAC service from a licensed HVAC contractor.

Rebate of 50% of cost up to $175 for a home energy management system bundle: including ENERGY STAR certified smart thermosat and LED fixture, connected plug load device, and permanently installed occupancy/motion sensor.
